description: This file demonstrates how to manually add, retrieve, delete, and replace user memories using the Memory class from agno.memory.v2, including interactions with UserMemory objects and printing the memory states.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: A class managing user memories, allowing addition, retrieval, deletion, and replacement of memories.

classes.name: UserMemory
classes.description: A class representing a user's memory with associated topics.

methods.name: add_user_memory
methods.description: Adds a new user memory to the Memory instance.

methods.name: get_user_memories
methods.description: Retrieves all memories associated with a specific user.

methods.name: delete_user_memory
methods.description: Deletes a specific memory for a user.

methods.name: replace_user_memory
methods.description: Replaces an existing user memory with a new one.
